//
// Structure of Database:
//
// Group,ItemID1,ItemID2,ItemID3,ItemID4,ItemID6,...ItemID50
//

5,529,530			// Candy
6,531,532,534		// Juice
7,544,551			// Raw Fish
8,603,617,644			// Old Boxes
9,715,716,717			// Gemstones
10,909,7126			// Jellopy
11,756,757,998,999,1002,1003,1010,1011	// Ores
12,512,513,514,515,516,517,528,529,530,544,551	// Food-Types
